newsitem.title: UK: UK Feb corporate insolvencies up 37 pct,trend down.
newsitem.headline: UK Feb corporate insolvencies up 37 pct,trend down.

text.p: Corporate insolvencies in Britain jumped to 173 in February, a 37 percent increase from the previous month but still consistent with an eight year declining trend, international accounting firm Deloitte & Touche found in its latest study.
Companies in the manufacturing sector topped the list with 54 administrative receivership appointments, followed by finance/business services and construction with 23 each.
